sentences.sContent: I am napoleon, I am emperor… burned it!
sentences.sContent_eng: I am napoleon, I am emperor… burned it!
sentences.sCn: 我就是拿破仑，我就是皇帝…烧掉它！

sentences.sContent: ...Tradition has it that an ancient Chinese emperor discovered the tea five thousand years ago and used it to treat illnesses...

trans.tranOther: the man who is the ruler of an empire
